# MyMathLib ðŸ§®
A simple math library for Python with basic, advanced, and geometry functions.

## ðŸ“¦ Installation
```bash
pip install mymathlib

 #USAGE

from mymathlib import BasicMath, AdvancedMath, Geometry

b = BasicMath()
print(b.add(5, 3))

a = AdvancedMath()
print(a.factorial(5))

g = Geometry()
print(g.area_circle(7))
